description: The Japanese beautyberry, or Callicarpa japonica, is an amazing plant species for many reasons. It boasts vibrant purple berries that remain in clusters from summer through to winter, and deep green leaves that offer year-round color even in the coldest climates. It's also easy to care for with minimal maintenance, being naturally resistant to pests and diseases. Beyond being an attractive addition to any outdoor space, the berries provide a rich source of food for birds and mammals, encouraging wildlife to your property. Its low-maintenance nature and low-maintenance growth make it an ideal choice for yards of all sizes.
